name: School Bus Fun
description: Taking your daughter to school sounds dead easy. But more than a dozen different kids all with different demands makes School Bus Fun a challenging time management game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 3D compatible graphic card with 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Can't even get the game to start up. Click play, starts up in full-screen, a white box(4:3 with black bars!). The white screen fades to black and I can hear some changing sound, but I can't do antying, just stays black. Apparently this has been a problem since day one.
it's a great air combat game but has bias towards the russian planes
This game is not good at all. All you do is click on stuff. I can tell you now it's straight up boring. Stay away from this game.
